snippet.name: fusedoc
snippet.help: I create the default fusedoc item
snippet.starttext:
<cfsilent> <!--- <fusedoc fuse="$${file:$${CURRENTFILE}}"> <responsibilities> $${responsibilities} </responsibilities> <properties> <history author="$${author:$${USERNAME}}" date="$${date:$${DAYOFMONTH} $${MONTHNUMBER} $${YEAR}}" type="$${action:create|modify}"/> <property name="RBdocver" value="2.0"> <property name="Date" value="$Date: 2004/12/23 17:37:35 $ "> <property name="Revision" value="$Revision: 1.1 $"/> <property name="Workfile" value="$Workfile: $"/> <property name="Author" value="$Author: markdrew $ "/> <property name="Modtime" value="$Modtime: $"/> <property name="Header" value="$Header: /cvsroot/fusebox3cfe/fusebox3cfe/snippets/fusebox3/fusedoc.xml,v 1.1 2004/12/23 17:37:35 markdrew Exp $"/> <property name="Source" value="$Source: /cvsroot/fusebox3cfe/fusebox3cfe/snippets/fusebox3/fusedoc.xml,v $"/> <history> $Log: fusedoc.xml,v $ Revision 1.1 2004/12/23 17:37:35 markdrew fusebox3 snippets
</history> </properties> <io> </io> </fusedoc> ---> </cfsilent>
